CustomField.description: If Variable: input total margin in % above the applicable base rate quoted to client. If below, input with minus symbol. If Fixed: input all-in fixed rate in %. If Preference Share: input the applicable % of Prime as quoted to client. SGPRT-624
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Variable: input total margin in % above the applicable base rate quoted to client. If below, input with minus symbol If Fixed: input all-in fixed rate in % If Preference Share: input the applicable % of Prime as quoted to client
CustomField.label: Facility Pricing (%)
